title: James Gunn Takes Over the DC Universe, New Marvel Trailers, and ‘Andor’ Episode 8
description:
Chris and Andy talk about the news that James Gunn and Peter Safran are being tapped to lead the DC Extended Universe and what that means for the future of the studio (1:00). Then they talk about the new trailers released for ‘Ant-Man and the Wasp’ and ‘The Guardians of the Galaxy Holiday Special’ (28:26), before talking about the latest episode of ‘Andor’ (36:05).

Hosts: Chris Ryan and Andy Greenwald
Producer: Kaya McMullen
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
